title: "Building multi-modal biological LLMs - checking out the ambitions at Bioptimus"
excerpt: "The goal is to better reflect properties of biological data modalities that may not be best captured by the current practices in natural language processing and computer vision, which focus on language and images meant to be understood by humans."
